alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:36PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northwestern Oxford... central Somerset...southern Franklin and northeastern Coos Counties... At 332 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Eustis to 12 miles northwest of Rangeley to near Dixville...and moving southeast AT 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Colebrook, Eustis, Rangeley, Kingfield, Bingham, Andover, Carrabassett Valley, Errol, Dixville, Phillips, Pittsburg, Weld, Grafton, Stratford, Embden, Columbia, Avon, Dallas Plantation, Clarksville and Byron. This also includes... Umbagog Lake State Park, Saddleback Mountain, Sugarloaf Mountain, Crocker Mountain, and The Bigelows. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Heavier snow showers and snow squalls are expected to follow soon after this first round of snow showers.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Somerset
